timeline.message:
ESR Import + processing autom. after upload via drag&drop
https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6328

timeline.bodyText: pls move this method to TableAttachementListenerRepository because we want to  avoid using I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener outside repos.
timeline.author: teosarca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@

+
+import de.metas.i18n.AdMessageId;
+import de.metas.javaclasses.JavaClassId;
+import lombok.NonNull;
+import lombok.Value;
+import org.compiere.model.I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener;
+
+import javax.annotation.Nullable;
+
+@Value
+public class AttachmentListenerSettings
+{
+	@NonNull
+	JavaClassId listenerJavaClassId;
+
+	boolean isSendNotification;
+
+	@Nullable
+	AdMessageId adMessageId;
+
+	public static AttachmentListenerSettings of(final I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener record)

+import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;
+
+@Repository
+public class TableAttachmentListenerRepository
+{
+	private final CCache<AdTableId, ImmutableList<AttachmentListenerSettings>> cache = CCache.<AdTableId, ImmutableList<AttachmentListenerSettings>> builder()
+			.cacheName("listenersByAdTableId")
+			.cacheMapType(CCache.CacheMapType.LRU)
+			.initialCapacity(100)
+			.tableName(I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener.Table_Name)
+			.build();
+
+	public ImmutableList<AttachmentListenerSettings> findForId(final AdTableId adTableId)

replies.bodyText:
also, we usually call this kind of classes Requests. In this case the name would be RunESRImportRequest.
Not sure if it's the best name, but so far that's what we use.
replies.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
We use to call this methods something like 'retrieveAttachmentListenerSettings`.
Basically we call it retrieve because they are retrieving (aka loading) from database.
getOrLoad is also misleading because we are always retrieving (aka loading).
timeline.author: teosarca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,69 @@
+/*
+ * #%L
+ * de.metas.adempiere.adempiere.base
+ * %%
+ * Copyright (C) 2019 metas GmbH
+ * %%
+ * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify

+ * GNU General Public License for more details.
+ *
+ * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public
+ * License along with this program. If not, see
+ * <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html>.
+ * #L%
+ */
+
+package de.metas.attachments.listener;
+
+import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList;
+import de.metas.cache.CCache;
+import de.metas.util.Services;
+import org.adempiere.ad.dao.IQueryBL;
+import org.adempiere.ad.table.api.AdTableId;
+import org.adempiere.ad.trx.api.ITrx;
+import org.compiere.model.I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener;
+import org.compiere.util.Env;
+import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;
+
+@Repository
+public class TableAttachmentListenerRepository
+{
+	private final CCache<AdTableId, ImmutableList<AttachmentListenerSettings>> cache = CCache.<AdTableId, ImmutableList<AttachmentListenerSettings>> builder()
+			.cacheName("listenersByAdTableId")
+			.cacheMapType(CCache.CacheMapType.LRU)
+			.initialCapacity(100)
+			.tableName(I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener.Table_Name)
+			.build();
+
+	public ImmutableList<AttachmentListenerSettings> findForId(final AdTableId adTableId)
+	{
+		return cache.getOrLoad(adTableId, this::getOrLoad);
+	}
+
+	/**
+	 * Queries {@link I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener} for listeners linked to the given {@link AdTableId}.
+	 *
+	 * @param adTableId DB identifier of the table.
+	 * @return list of {@link AttachmentListenerSettings} ordered by {@link I_AD_Table_AttachmentListener#getSeqNo()}.
+	 */
+	private ImmutableList<AttachmentListenerSettings> getOrLoad(final AdTableId adTableId )

timeline.bodyText: declare the Services.get(IESRImportBL.class) service as a class field
timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
objects shall be valid when u construct them.
Pls do this calidation when u construct AttachmentListenerSettings.
Here i expect to be valid.
timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
wondering why not  having the adMessageContentValue in AttachmentListenerSettings instead of AdMessageId?
I know it's a bit in the gray zone....
Btw, in that case, u could use AdMessageKey (was newly introduced).
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of runESRImportFor woundering if it wouldn't be better to call it scheduleESRImport.
schedule because it's gonna happen async.
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca
